data.oai_dc:dc: Dataset for size-evaluation in studies of shape

This dataset contains for each revised paper: whether the paper evaluated the allometric effects of size on shape, the impact factor of the journal, the dimensionality of the landmarks used in the paper, the type of allometry (if known with certainty) and the mean percentage of shape variation explained by size (if available).
allometry|Generalized Procrustes Analysis|geometric morphometrics|literature review|superimposition of landmark configurations
